function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of cross-boundary collaboration in pandemic management and recovery planning","Impact":"Ineffective response to pandemics, increased spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Establishing cross-boundary collaboration mechanisms, integrating departmental structures, and aligning government strategies","Technologies":"Collaboration platforms, digital communication tools, data sharing technologies","People":"Public health authorities, government officials, urban planners, citizens","Owner":"Government authorities, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Lack of strategic alignment in city response to environmental pressures and pandemics","Impact":"Inefficient use of resources, ineffective pandemic management, and recovery","Mitigation":"Implementing integrated and holistic strategic planning processes, fostering cross-border collaboration, and deploying ICTs effectively","Technologies":"Integrated planning software, collaboration platforms, data analytics tools","People":"Urban planners, government officials, public health authorities","Owner":"Urban governance authorities, strategic planning committees"},{"Description":"Ineffective implementation of strategic alignment in governance models","Impact":"Decreased service quality for citizens, ineffective decision-making, and reduced ability to achieve strategic goals","Mitigation":"Promoting stakeholder participation, implementing collaborative governance models, and leveraging emerging technologies","Technologies":"Governance platforms, collaboration tools, stakeholder engagement platforms","People":"Urban governance authorities, stakeholders, citizens","Owner":"Urban governance authorities, strategic planning committees"}]}
